response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its immense value to you, which stands at $800,000. Our proposal is to offer it to you for a price that reflects its true worth and benefits both parties. We kindly invite you to consider our offer at $1,200,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. We believe this arrangement will be mutually beneficial. Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions regarding our proposal. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
